Package ua.nure.khshanovskyi.infoLife.filter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationSessionFilter
    This filter for restore HttpSession for User from Cookie which we got from User.
    CharacterSetFilter
    This filter for encoding information from view layer.
    FilterBlockUser
    This filter redirect users which have the Constant.BLOCKED status in HttpSession.getAttribute(String) from pages listed bellow to "/BLOCKED" page.
    FilterForGuestsToBLOCKEDPage
    This filter redirect users which don't have authorization from "/BLOCKED" page to "/media" page.
    FilterForUserInLogin
    This filter redirect users which have authorization from pages listed bellow to "/media" page.
    FilterFromUserWithoutAuthorization
    This filter redirect users which don't have authorization from pages listed bellow to "/media" page.
    LoginInvalidFilter
    This filter skip HttpSession with attribute Constant.INVALID if user left login page and go to pages listed bellow.
    SubscriptionDTOFilter
    This filter skip HttpSession.removeAttribute(String) with SubscriptionDTO if user go to pages listed bellow.
